attributes.action: install solar panels as a primary means of energy production in all schools throughout the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "install solar panels as a primary means of energy production in all schools throughout the uk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22848


Prime Minister's Office
